LL.LOG: When DMA_M2M field in the DMA_InitTypeDef structure is set to DMA_M2M_Enable LL_DMA_DIRECTION_MEMORY_TO_MEMORY
When DMA_M2M field in the SPL DMA_InitTypeDef structure is set to DMA_M2M_Enable, then Direction field in the LL DMA_InitTypeDef structure should be set to LL_DMA_DIRECTION_MEMORY_TO_MEMORY
DMA_M2M field is removed from available LL_DMA_InitTypeDef structure
